content: make your own adorable knit hedgehog knit in one piece without a lick of sewing or even grafting these sweet little hedgies are super fun to make and even more fun to cuddle materials - main yarn 1 skein or approximately 128 yards of a worsted weight yarn - contrast yarn 1 skein or less than 150 yards of a dk weight yarn - a set of us 4 3 5 mm double pointed needles 1 - a set of us 8 5 mm double pointed needles - stuffing - scrap yarn in a heavy worsted or chunky weight for the eyes and nose i used purl soho s super soft merino 2 in soft black here s what we used for our samples pink - main yarn 1 skein of cascade s eco cloud 70% undyed merino wool and 30% undyed baby alpaca this color is ecru - contrast yarn 1 skein of manos del uruguay s silk blend 70% merino extrafine wool and 30% silk this color is shocking natural - main yarn 1 skein of cascade s eco cloud 70% undyed merino wool and 30% undyed baby alpaca this color is wild dove - contrast yarn 1 skein of manos del uruguay s silk blend 70% merino extrafine wool and 30% silk this color is natural blue - main yarn 1 skein of cascade s 128 superwash 100% superwash merino this color is feather grey - contrast yarn 1 skein of manos del uruguay s silk blend 70% merino extrafine wool and 30% silk this color is juniper gauge - 7 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch using the contrast yarn and the smaller needles - 5 5 stitches = 1 inch in garter stitch using the main yarn and the larger needles size about 6 inches long x 11½ inches around 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 2 https //www purlsoho com/purl/products/item/8944-purl-soho-super-soft-merino
